name: Ascent (Alpha Demo)
description:
Ascend to the top.

Encounter other Travelers, and when you do, will you Slay? Or will you Recruit?

Pick your first party member, and the rest is randomized from the encounters to the loot. Decide if you want a smaller party with higher levels, or a full party that may have to deal with being lower leveled.

Enjoy this Roguelike-RPG (Alpha)!
